segments.text: Good morning . This is Apple Corporation . May I speak to Ballam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m calling to offer you the position of computer engineer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I ask how much I can get every month ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your starting salary is 3 , 000 yuan a month , but if you work well we will put you on our regular staff after six months time and your salary will be raised to 5,000 yuan a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought the starting salary is too low .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the lowest salary you may consider ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to make 4,000 yuan a month for supporting my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s all right . We will pay you 4 , 000 yuan a month for supporting your family . Would you like to start on next Monday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Thank you for hiring me , I am very proud to be employed by your company and I will come in at eight o ’ clock sharp Monday .
segments.speaker: S2
